The expert: s verdict highlights that President Trump's comparison between his response to COVID-19 and President Obama's handling of the H1N1 influenza pandemic is frequently incorrect or misleading.
The expert points out that the two virus: COVID-19 and H1N1, are very different, making it inappropriate to compare their responses directly.
The expert refutes Trump: s claim that the Obama administration did nothing or waited a long time to act on the H1N1 pandemic, stating that it is not true.
The expert provides accurate information: including the number of cases, hospitalizations, and deaths, to provide context and clarify any misconceptions.
